pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulate with 'mrgsolve' in Parallel // Simulation from an 'mrgsolve' https://cran.r-project.org/package=mrgsolve model using a parallel backend. Input data sets are split (chunked) and simulated in parallel using mclapply() or future_lapply() https://cran.r-project.org/package=future.apply.
